channel.title: Little question
channel.description: if i had a PHP script, how wud i make it so that it shows up on my site, im REALLY new at this so plz dont laugh - .- alright ty if you try to help lol, ill be checking this 100 times a day... :(

item.title: Little question
item.dc:creator: @iwasinmoparseas101cl iwasinmoparseas101class
item.description:
@iwasinmoparseas101cl wrote:

it depends really…You can embed the php into your code like raindrops first example, or put the include(“file”) in the tags of your html.

However if you’re creating a index.php you might want to think of doing something like:

<?php echo ""; //sets up your html tags echo "text you want to appear for everyone to see"; echo ""; //close the html tags ?>

That is technically a working html/php page. You should also try getting into the habit of using Classes and variables for the purpose of manipulating data and being more organized.

Read full topic

item.title: Little question
item.dc:creator: @raindropsc raindropsc
item.description:
@raindropsc wrote:

depends on what you want to show up,
if you want it to show the word “Duh…I A Fucking Idiot”,
you would do this

<?php echo 'Duh....I A Fucking Idiot'; ?>
if you want the contents of a file to show up,
you would do this

<?php
include('YourFuckingFile.blah');
?>

Also, Remember To Save It As ‘File.php’

Read full topic
